about_the_game:
In Crayon Crusaders VR, you’re dropped into the boundless imagination of a child where crayons are your ultimate weapon, and your creative mind is your greatest ally. Face off against hordes of mischievous stickmen as they try to take over your vibrant, crayon-drawn world!

Build, Draw, and Defend
Using crayons, draw your towers and obstacles in real time to stop waves of stickman attackers. Experiment with different designs and approaches as you build the ultimate defense.

Face Stickman Shenanigans
These aren’t your ordinary enemies. From speedy runners to sneaky teleporters, each stickman type adds a fresh challenge, forcing you to stay sharp and think fast.

Features:

  • Playful Art Style: Dive into colourful, hand-drawn levels filled with quirky details that bring the imagination of a child to life.

  • Dynamic Challenges: Stickmen come with clever abilities and behaviors, keeping every wave fresh and unpredictable.

  • Upgrade as You Play: Discover new crayon colours and tower upgrades that add powerful effects and fun designs.

  • Explore a Whimsical Mind: From bustling imaginary cities to space-age doodle-scapes, every level offers something new and exciting.
